title: I can't play. Help me
body:
Hello! So i played a game with my friend and then after the game there was "Waiting For stats", but i skipped stats and so did my friend. So i tried to q up with him but it said ERROR and something about existing game. We tried solo q but it didn't work either so we decided to relog. After relog RECONNECT popped out and now if i click on it it shows black screen. 


What should i do?


Why cant i play this game ffs {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} .

replies.body: It sounds like you are experiencing a connection issue with our game server which would result in the black screen you mentioned.  If you are still experiencing this issue, please go over the steps provided in our[ troubleshooting connections ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up but please let me know if you have any questions!
You should be able to play now. Let us know if it's still not working.
